services.title: Static CDS Service Example
services.description: An example of a CDS Service that returns a static set of cards

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Prior authorization
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Provides indications of whether prior authorization is required for the proposed order

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Prior Authorization Forms
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Indicates any forms that should be completed as part of a prior authorization process

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Alternative therapy
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Provides recommendations for alternative therapy with equivalent/similar clinical effect for which the patient has better coverage, that will incur lesser cost

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: First-line therapy
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Provides alternative therapies that must be tried prior to the selected medication to receive coverage for the selected medication

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Maximum cards
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Indicates the maximum number of cards to be returned from the service.  The services will prioritize cards such as highest priority ones are delivered

services.title: Order Echo CDS Service
services.description: An example of a CDS Service that simply echoes the order(s) being placed

services.title: Pharmacogenomics CDS Service
services.description: An example of a more advanced, precision medicine CDS Service
services.usageRequirements: Note: functionality of this CDS Service is degraded without access to a FHIR Restful API as part of CDS recommendation generation.
